amendment.description: To make funds available for the Arrow ballistic missile defense system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4326 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4326 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To make funds available for the Arrow ballistic missile defense system.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4326 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4326 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
